twists.name: Lords of War
twists.description: Add 3 to the Attacks characteristic of each weapon equipped by WARLORD models (excluding VEHICLES).

twists.name: Bloodlust
twists.description: Units are eligible to charge if they are within 18" of one or more enemy units (instead of 12"), and roll 3D6 for Charge rolls.

twists.name: Night Fighting
twists.description: Each unit can only be the target of a ranged attack if the attacking model is within 18".

twists.name: High Octane
twists.description: Each time a unit Advances, do not make an Advance roll. Instead, until the end of the phase, add 6" to the Move characteristic of models in that unit.

twists.name: Martial Pride
twists.description: BATTLELINE units can start Actions even if they Advanced, and can make ranged attacks while performing an Action.

twists.name: Ruinscape
twists.description: Each time a unit makes a Normal move or Advances, it can move horizontally through terrain features.

twists.name: Adapt or Die
twists.description: At the start of each battle round after the first, each player can change one of their selected Secondary Missions.

twists.name: Point Blank
twists.description: All ranged weapons have the Pistol ability (except weapons with the Blast ability).

twists.name: Rapid Escalation
twists.description: In the first battle round, up to 20% of your army's points can arrive from Strategic Reserves (no Deep Strike).
